So, What is Jekyll?

Jun 9, 2014

Jekyll is a tool for transforming your plain text into static websites and blogs. It is simple, static, and blog-aware. Jekyll uses the Liquidtemplating language and has builtin Markdown and Textile support.

It also ties in nicely to Github Pages.

Learn more about Jekyll on their website.

Crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine).
